00029 class FdoSchemaMergeContext;

00031 /// \brief
00032 /// FdoPropertyValueConstraint is an abstract class that derives from FdoIDisposable.
00033 /// FdoPropertyValueConstraint is the base class of FdoPropertyValueConstraintRange 
00034 /// and FdoPropertyValueConstraintList.
00035 class FdoPropertyValueConstraint : public FdoIDisposable
00036 {
00037 
00038 public:
00039     /// \brief
00040     /// Abstract operation that must be implemented by derived classes to return the constraint type.
00041     /// 
00042     /// \return
00043     /// Returns the constraint type
00044     /// 
00045     FDO_API virtual FdoPropertyValueConstraintType GetConstraintType() = 0;
00046 
00047 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00048     // Public non-API functions for XML and Schema Merge support
00049 
00050     // Update this value constraint from the given value constraint.
00051     virtual void Set( FdoPropertyValueConstraint* /*pConstraint*/, FdoString* /*parentName*/, FdoSchemaMergeContext* /*pContext*/ )
00052     {
00053     }
00054 
00055     // \brief
00056     // Compares this value constraint with another one.
00057     // 
00058     // \param value 
00059     // The Property Value constraint to compare with
00060     // 
00061     // \return
00062     // Returns true if this Property Value Constraint is the same as pConstraint
00063     // (all members have the same values).
00064     virtual bool Equals( FdoPropertyValueConstraint* pConstraint ) = 0;
00065 /// \endcond
00066 };
